class.name: ocgd_step_reader
class.brief_description: A reader for importing STEP (.step, .stp) CAD files using OpenCASCADE.
class.description: The ocgd_step_reader provides functionality to import STEP (Standard for the Exchange of Product Data) files into OpenCASCADE shape objects. It supports loading assemblies, parts, colors, names, and layer information from STEP files. STEP files are widely used in CAD applications for exchanging 3D models and assembly data.

method.name: new_reader
method.description: Creates a new STEP reader instance with default settings.

method.name: load_file
method.description: Loads a STEP file and returns the imported shape. Uses default import options.

method.name: load_file_with_options
method.description: Loads a STEP file with custom import options. The options dictionary can contain keys like "units" and "precision" to control the import process.

method.name: get_file_info
method.description: Returns information about the reader and its current state, including transfer settings and any errors.

method.name: get_all_shapes
method.description: Returns an array of all shapes found in the last loaded file. Currently returns an empty array (implementation planned for future versions).

method.name: set_transfer_colors
method.description: Enables or disables the transfer of color information from STEP files during import.

method.name: get_transfer_colors
method.description: Returns true if color transfer is enabled.

method.name: set_transfer_names
method.description: Enables or disables the transfer of name/label information from STEP files during import.

method.name: get_transfer_names
method.description: Returns true if name transfer is enabled.

method.name: set_transfer_layers
method.description: Enables or disables the transfer of layer information from STEP files during import.

method.name: get_transfer_layers
method.description: Returns true if layer transfer is enabled.

method.name: get_last_error
method.description: Returns the last error message encountered during import operations.

method.name: has_error
method.description: Returns true if there was an error in the last operation.

method.name: clear_error
method.description: Clears the current error state and message.

method.name: validate_file
method.description: Validates whether a file can be read as a STEP file without fully importing it. Returns true if the file appears to be a valid STEP file.

method.name: get_supported_extensions
method.description: Returns an array of supported file extensions for STEP files: ["step", "stp"].

method.name: is_null
method.description: Returns false (readers are never considered null).
